fr.sysgli.disbotapi.commands

Class CommandExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sysgli.disbotapi.commands.CommandExecutor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PermissionsExecutor

    public abstract class CommandExecutor
extends java.lang.Object

    Abstract class modeling every command execution.

    Each Command needs a CommandExecutor in order to do something when called.

    Author:
    Jérémy LAMBERT

    • Method Detail

      • getDisbot

        public Disbot getDisbot()
        Returns the Disbot which this Command is associated with.
        Returns:
        a Disbot instance
        See Also:
        Disbot, Command, CommandManager

      • onCommand

        public abstract boolean onCommand(DiscordUser user,
                                  net.dv8tion.jda.entities.Guild guild,
                                  net.dv8tion.jda.entities.MessageChannel channel,
                                  java.lang.String[] args,
                                  java.util.List<net.dv8tion.jda.entities.User> mentionedUsers)
        Called whenever the command is used.
        Parameters:
        user - who used the command, be careful : null if the sender is the console !
        guild - from which the command was sent
        channel - from which the command was used
        args - (arguments)
        mentionedUsers, - a list of all mentioned users in this message
        Returns:
        false if the command is not correctly used

      • getCommand

        public Command getCommand()

        Returns the Command containing this CommandExecutor.

        Useful to get extra informations such as the permission message.

        Returns:
        Command command
        See Also:
        Command
